contents: Article 11 (Registration Period) In principle, registration of athletes shall be done on a rolling basis, but member sports organizations may set and operate a separate registration period. However, in the following cases, regular registration is required. 1. When an athlete under the age of 12 registers. Revised on May 4, 2023. 2. When an athlete registers for the first time with the relevant member sport organization. 3. When registering as a member of a new team. 4. When registering an athlete after enlisting or being discharged from the military.
